column2: % of residents obtaining abortions who traveled out of state for care, 2020
column3: No. of abortions per 1,000 women aged 15–44, by state of residence, 2020 [1]

column1: 1. Numerator includes all abortions to residents of each state, regardless of patient’s age at outcome., 2. u = unavailable, 3. n/a = not applicable
